page.title: 16Living on a new estate
page.content: I live in{Thornton's Way}on the new {Grove Farm estate.}On the nearby Kingswood Road there is a Spar shop, an old peoples home, a social club which has now closed and a new pub. Opposite the club there is some wasteland where they intend to build a doctor's surgery, a chemist amd some shops - so it won't be so far to go to the doctor's. The area is all right but there are a few{vandals}around who spoiled my mum's battery car and write on car windows and walls. There are two {playgrounds,}one for younger children and one for older. There is a{Post {Office}and some other shops at the top of the hill but it's a long way for the{old people.}The houses are not very well built especially the windows which are very easy to open from the outside. (12 year old schoolgirl)
